title.rendered: Obi Alfred Announces The Launch Of His Upcoming EP “Avalon: Part One”

content.rendered:
Obi Alfred is an emerging contemporary R&B artist from Austin, Texas.

AUSTIN, TEXAS, UNITED STATES, November 20, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — Obi Alfred, a rising star in the world of contemporary R&B, is set to captivate audiences once again with his new single, “Follow Me.” The track marks the third installment in his upcoming EP, “Avalon: Part One,” following the success of his debut single, “Mind,” and the club anthem “Get It.”

“Mind,” Obi’s debut release, provided a compelling glimpse into the artist’s intricate mind, blending sensuous R&B vibes with pop sensibilities, creating a dynamic sound that resonated with audiences. The track served as an introduction to his forthcoming full-length EP, offering a thematic exploration of infatuation, passion, obsession, and seduction. Obi Alfred’s ability to craft imaginative lyrics and convey his personality through music garnered attention, setting the stage for his musical journey.

Following the immense success of “Mind,” which amassed over 20,000 streams in just four days and surpassed 100,000 in under five weeks, Obi Alfred introduced “Get It.” This track showcased a different facet of the artist, presenting a darker, more seductive side. The success of “Get It” was further amplified by an accompanying music video.

Obi Alfred is gearing up to release “Follow Me,” the third entry in his musical saga. The track promises a unique experience, focusing on “THE STRIP” and featuring Legacy (@certifiedcocoo). Described as a show that audiences will never forget, “Follow Me” is anticipated to add a new dimension to Obi’s growing discography.

“Follow Me” effortlessly transcends musical boundaries. With its intoxicating blend of sensuous R&B tones, modern pop nuances, and the electric energy of “THE STRIP,” the song is a testament to Obi’s unparalleled artistry. The song is a praise-worthy symphony that not only solidifies Obi Alfred’s status as a musical virtuoso but also promises to leave an indelible mark on the contemporary R&B landscape. A pulsating rhythm, poetic lyricism, and an unmistakable aura of seduction converge in this praise-worthy composition, reaffirming Obi Alfred’s ascent as a true luminary in the realm of modern R&B.

Obi Alfred is carrying the torch of classic R&B for a new generation. Born in New Jersey and raised in Texas, the Nigerian-American artist pays tribute to R&B legends while pushing into bold, modern territory. His distinctive style and compelling music have positioned him as one of the most vital new voices in the genre.

“Follow Me” is set to reinforce Obi Alfred’s place in the music scene, building on the success of his previous releases. With afindeed focus on authenticity and a commitment to exploring diverse themes, Obi Alfred’s journey in the music industry is both unique and promising.

As Obi Alfred continues to carve his path in contemporary R&B, “Follow Me” is expected to resonate with fans and further establish him as an artist to watch. The single is available for pre-save, promising an unforgettable musical experience showcasing Obi Alfred’s evolving artistry.

Fans can experience the rhythm and emotion through Obi Alfred’s latest tracks on:

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/0chUWsWY8uX4Fbu0XC6wx5

Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/us/artist/obi-alfred/1643954728

And Tidal: https://tidal.com/browse/artist/34288815

For updates, follow The Obi Alfred Experience on Social Media:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/obialfredx/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100085648811163

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@obialfredx

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC38vQVKF8eomgJeAd9L1wNg

Roxanne Rebusio
The Obi Alfred Experience
Roxanne@obxlabel.com

You just read:

News Provided By

November 20, 2023, 12:14 GMT
